articles.title: Pan-cancer whole-genome comparison of primary and metastatic solid tumours - Nature.com
articles.description: The genomic differences between primary and metastatic tumours are assessed across 23 cancer types using pan-cancer whole-genome analysis.

articles.author: Rachael Funnell
articles.title: New Species Of Demon Shark From The Deep Has Unsettling White Irises - IFLScience
articles.description: Only one other deep-sea species is known to have eyes like these.
articles.content: A new species of deep-water catshark has been discovered in an unusual way, identified from its egg case by researchers in northwestern Australia. Named Apristurus ovicorrugatus, it has the Western A… [+2427 chars]
